name: Jaswanth
cooked: Proof of Partial Work (PoPW) refers to the concept of shares contributed by miners in a mining pool. In the context of mining pools, shares are submitted by miners to demonstrate the work they’ve done, even if that work hasn’t yet resulted in finding a block. These shares are essentially proof of partial work, as they show that the miner has contributed effort
raw: Proof of Partial Work (PoPW) refers to the concept of shares contributed by miners in a mining pool. In the context of mining pools, shares are submitted by miners to demonstrate the work they've done, even if that work hasn't yet resulted in finding a block. These shares are essentially proof of partial work, as they show that the miner has contributed effort
